unnormalised: Arre, mhojem bank account anink ekda block zalam! Mhaka mhojem PAN card (ABCDE1234F) ani Aadhaar number (9876-5432-1012) branchak submit korchem poddttelem.
normalised: Arre, mhajem bank account portun block zalam! Mhaka mhojem P-A-N card (A-B-C-D-E one two three four F) ani Aadhaar no. (nine eight seven six dash five four three two dash one zero one two) branch-ak submit korchem poddttelem.
text: Arre, mhojem bank account anink ekda block zalam! Mhaka mhojem PAN card (ABCDE1234F) ani Aadhaar number (9876-5432-1012) branchak submit korchem poddttelem.
